description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Frisco, United States. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Dallas Escape near The Star with Infinity Pool, Restaurant & Two Bars
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of Texan hospitality at this contemporary chic urban retreat, situated in the heart of Frisco's vibrant sports and entertainment district. Relish mouthwatering Southern cuisine at the hotel's Neighborhood Services restaurant, or sip on a refreshing cocktail at the upscale Edge Waterside Lounge & Bar. Just steps away, explore the Dallas Cowboys' world headquarters at The Star, indulge in retail therapy at the nearby Stonebriar Centre or explore the exciting dining scene and nightlife of North Texas. After a day of adventure, retreat to the fourth-floor infinity pool for a refreshing dip against the backdrop of the city's dynamic skyline.

hotels.title: Frisco Contemporary Golf Resort with Onsite Restaurants, Bars & Two Championship Courses
hotels.description: Practise your game at one of Texas' premier golfing resorts. This golfer's paradise offers unrivalled access to two championship golf courses, a lighted 10-hole short course and the Professional Golfers' Association of America's headquarters. After a day on the greens, savour Texas-inspired cuisine across seven onsite eateries or enjoy a craft cocktail at the rooftop pool bar, boasting panoramic views of Frisco Hill. For non-golfers, the nearby Stonebriar Centre offers high-end shopping and dining options.

seo.title: Hoteles en Frisco - Estados Unidos Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Frisco, United States con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
